aboutParagraph1: It all began when I discovered I could create something out of nothing with just lines of code. I am currently pursuing a degree in Computer Systems Engineering at the National Technological Institute of Mexico, where every day I reaffirm my passion for transforming ideas into digital solutions.
aboutParagraph2: My focus goes beyond code: I specialize in creating web experiences that truly matter. I have built everything from management systems for bakeries to government ticketing platforms, always prioritizing functionality, security, and user experience. My primary stack includes PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, and modern tools to build useful, accessible, and modern solutions.
techDescription: These are the main tools I use to create functional and visually appealing websites.
animacionesTitulo: I also design interactive animations for your website!
animacionesTexto: Add life, interaction, and professionalism to your site. Impress your visitors from the very first look!
detail-title: Explore each step of the process
detail-description: Hover over any step to see the details of how I work in each stage of your project.
interactionHint: Interact with each step to see the details

panaderiaServicio2: Admin panel for products and users
panaderiaServicio3: User authentication with roles (employee, admin, client)
panaderiaServicio4: Security: users without admin permissions cannot access the control panel
panaderiaDescripcion: This system aims to digitalize the internal and external management of a bakery, allowing the administration of products, users, sales, and clients through an admin panel. It improves operational efficiency and provides an accessible customer experience.
sistemaTicketsServicio1: Ticket management and administration by the responsible department
sistemaTicketsServicio2: Detailed report generation in PDF format
sistemaTicketsServicio3: Form submission security: field validation and SQL injection protection
sistemaTicketsServicio4: Cache implementation to prevent duplicate submissions, spam, and bots
sistemaTicketsServicio5: Form data is preserved even if the page is refreshed or an error occurs
sistemaTicketsDescripcion: This system allows users to report technical issues and receive follow-up from the IT department. It speeds up issue resolution and improves internal work organization.
comercializadoraServicio2: Product and service section organized by categories
comercializadoraServicio3: Dynamic carousels for better visualization of products and promotions
comercializadoraServicio5: Direct contact channel for potential clients (WhatsApp, form or email)
comercializadoraDescripcion: Static page designed to present the branding and catalog of a distribution company. Its goal is to facilitate commercial contact and improve the business's digital presence.
portafolioDescripcion: Professional digital portfolio of a video and audio editing specialist, developed to showcase audiovisual projects ranging from social media content to advertising pieces and documentaries.
sikiDescripcion: Online store specializing in high-quality sports uniforms for amateur and professional teams. Platform developed on Tiendanube with a responsive design and a structure adapted to the specific needs of the business.
readySubtitle: Let's turn your idea into a professional web solution
guaranteeText: Clean, documented code with post-delivery support
toastAnimationMessage: This animation was programmed by me.
